dcterms:creator: K. Ito
dcterms:description: The LJSpeech dataset contains 13100 short utterances from a single female speaker reading passages from 7 audio books, with a total audio amounting to about 24 hours recorded on a Macbook Pro in a home setting with a sampling rate of 22050 Hz.
dcterms:title: LJSpeech Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Kominek
A. W. Black
dcterms:description: The CMU Arctic dataset contains 1132 utterances from several speakers, used for voice conversion experiments.
dcterms:title: CMU Arctic Dataset
